source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Poetical drawing with colored pencils
items.headline: Four different landscapes with shadowing
objectives_summary: *easy and professional use of coloured pensils.  * colormix. * Drowing landscapes

items.title: Learn how to PLAN & paint a watercolor from your PHOTOS.

visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore

items.headline: This will help you make a great composition from a photo. How tp make changes, solve problems, select colours & paint.
objectives_summary: Learn how to extract a composition from a photo.
Learn how to use your 'artist's licence' to get what YOU want.
See how you can easily make changes to a composition.

items.title: Watercolor Painting Course for Beginner
items.headline: Learn Landscape Watercolor Painting Techniques. Get sense and vision to turn any Landscape Photo to Painting.
objectives_summary: You will learn how to create beautiful nature painting in watercolor medium.
You will learn main types of paints used for Painting.
You will learn some Golden rules of watercolor painting.

items.title: Master strong colors, curves, shape & shadow in 5 EASY STEPS

visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore

items.headline: Learn watercolor painting the easy way, without even noticing. no boring bits just fun & a colorful, finished picture.
objectives_summary: Complete this watercolour picture in FIVE easy stages
Have fun while you learn to paint in watercolour.
Plan an order of working and how to use masking fluid/latex.

items.title: Impressionism - Paint this Paris Scene in oil or acrylic
items.headline: Learn Impressionism techniques by creating this Paris Street painting. For total beginner through advanced painters.
objectives_summary: Create an entire painting in one sitting
Understand Impressionism and why it is so powerful
Understand how light works to make things look the way they do, and how to translate that into your paintings

items.title: Conscious Drawing Techniques - for beginners
items.headline: Learn to draw easily, while exploring your creative self and building confidence in your drawing and creative abilities.
objectives_summary: Explore your creativity and self expression while learning beginner drawing techniques.
Learn to draw with mindfulness and conscious creation.
Create drawings with creative detail and self expression.

items.title: TOP TIPS for watercolor painting. Save time expense & stress

visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: After years or painting in watercolors I have gathered a few tips that may save you unwanted expense, time & frustration
objectives_summary: Students will feel able to correct mistakes.
Learn handy picture framing tips.
See how to look after your paints and brushes.

items.title: Drawing Dogs from Snout to Tail
items.headline: Learn to draw dogs like you've always wished you could.
objectives_summary: Gain the ability to draw dogs of any breed and from any angle. Four week course led by Jerry Joe Seltzer.

items.title: Learn how to paint Byzantine Icons (Part 2)
items.headline: Byzantine icons from scratch
objectives_summary: Learn how to paint icons from the beginning.
Learn how to paint in the byzantine style.
Learn how to paint in egg tempera technique.

items.title: Jewelry Making: How To Make Your Very Own Wedding Jewellery!
items.headline: Have fun getting creative ~ Make your dream bridal jewelry ~ Wow your friends & family with your beautiful creations!
objectives_summary: Design beautiful pieces of wedding jewelry
Make your own wedding jewelry!

items.title: Procreate Tutorial, a realistic hare  (digital ipad drawing)
items.headline: creating realistic fur in procreate
objectives_summary: In this course you will learn to draw a realistic hare in the app Procreate, an app on the Ipad. So it's a digital drawing!

items.title: Paint this Aspen scene: Watercolor painting in 3 EASY steps
items.headline: Watercolor painting, easy & fun! I show you step-by-step how to paint this lovely Aspen scene. Beginners welcome! Easy!
objectives_summary: Paint a beautiful Aspen painting in 30 minutes in watercolor
Learn that watercolors are easy and fun!
Have a great night of painting with your kids, class, or friends

items.title: Oil & Acrylic Painting - Tuscany Impressionist Landscape

visible_instructors.name: Rod
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Artist & Art Teacher
visible_instructors.title: Rod Moore

items.headline: Painting Course in Oils or Acrylic paint exploring Impressionism Techniques in landscape painting
objectives_summary: Paint Great Looking Impressionistic Landscapes
Capture a typical Tuscan scene in an Impressionistic Manner
Use Acrylic Paints With Confidence

items.title: Charcoal Basics for Beginners
items.headline: Learn to recreate a realistic image from a photograph
objectives_summary: How to recreate a realistic image from a photograph.
Measuring techniques for accuracy.
Charcoal techniques such as shading, lifting highlights, and adding textures.

items.title: Paper Quilling Course
items.headline: Learn how to make beautiful things with simple looking paper strips.
objectives_summary: Basic shapes and advance paper quilling techniques.
How to make different projects using all quilling techniques.

items.title: Oil painting methods
items.headline: A how to guide in the enduring art of oil painting
objectives_summary: Oil painting technique
